wikipedia_page.main: Eleri Mair Rees (née Morgan; born 7 July 1953) is a Welsh judge. Since 18 June 2012, she has been the Resident Judge of Cardiff Crown Court and Recorder of Cardiff. She has been a circuit judge since 2002. She was called to the bar in 1975, and served as a Justices' clerk from 1983 to 1994 and as a stipendiary magistrate (later renamed District Judge (Magistrates' Courts)) between 1994 and 2002.

response: Cardiff Crown Court () is a historic building situated in Cathays Park, Cardiff, Wales.  The building is a Grade I listed building.  The Crown Court is part of the Wales Circuit of Her Majesty's Courts Service. The court house has 10 courtrooms. The senior judge at the court is Judge Eleri Rees, the Recorder of Cardiff.
